text:
<@U4WS10WCQ|rdeycaza> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/rdeycaza/F58557AEP/2017-05-03_at_12.54.png|2017-05-03 at 12.54.png> and commented: Hi Everybody, 
One of our developers is trying to know if there is a query to fetch data in rows accordingly to the attached image.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/COS-Design-Support/How-to-filter-a-HubDB-query-with-a-column-value/td-p/8673>

I will appreciate any help you can provide
